    public class GeometrySimplifier
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for geometry simplifiers.

      • simplify

        public Geometry simplify(Geometry geometry,
                         float scale)
        Perform the simplification of the given geometry, given relative scale.
        Parameters:
        geometry - The geometry to simplify.
        scale - Relative scale for simplification, this is proportional to 2^zoom.
        Returns:
        The simplified geometry. If simplification failed, original geometry may be returned.
        Null pointer may be returned if geometry should be discarded.

      • swigGetClassName

        public java.lang.String swigGetClassName()
        Returns the actual class name of this object. This is used internally by the SDK.
        Returns:
        The class name of this object.

      • swigGetDirectorObject

        public java.lang.Object swigGetDirectorObject()
        Returns the connected director object. This is used internally by the SDK.
        Returns:
        The connected director object or null if director is not connected.
